post.author: 이계영
post.content:
My agent sent this mail to me.
Request # 95 Resource: 2 Web Developers Location: Toronto, ON Target Start Date: Approximate start date is June 2, 2003 Duration: Approximate duration is 3mths Target rate to Sierra: $55.00 to $60.00 per hour
Skills/Experience: The mandatory qualifications of the consultant are:
Web experience: - Java, J2EE (JSP, EJB) using STRUTS frame work, Borland, Weblogic 6.1, Oracle, Sybase
- Strong portal experience is required
Other: - Experience in a financial environment is an asset - Excellent analytical, problem solving and decision-making skills - Verbal and written communication skills; interpersonal and negotiation skills - Team player with a track record for meeting strict deadlines - Experience dealing with end-users
Please reply to:
Roy Andrade Phone: 416-265-9688 Direct roy@alliancesearch.net or royandrade@rogers.com
post.title: Java Contract in Toronto
